Trial_Design.evidence: Residents were randomized to take an on-line short course on frailty (experimental group) or to receive no training (control group).

Intervention.evidence: Residents were randomized to take an on-line short course on frailty (experimental group) or to receive no training (control group).

Objective.evidence: We assessed the influence of a frailty education module on surgical residents’ estimates of lobectomy risk.

Method_Outcome.evidence: made an initial risk estimate of major complications for lobectomy

Number_Randomised.evidence: Forty-one residents participated (20 in the experimental group).

Result_Outcome.evidence: The experimental group rated clinical factors as “very important” in their initial risk estimates more often than did the control group (47.6% vs 38.5%; p<0.001).
